message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your cut decreases faster than mine. Let's be realistic: 55-45.
I can still get a bit more, 58-42 is my new offer
This is my last offer above 50%. Take it or leave it.
You said that was your last offer above 50%, but I'm still not convinced. 56-44 is my counteroffer
Okay, you drive a hard bargain.  I'm willing to settle for a slight advantage, but this is absolutely my final offer.
